mapper.select: select a.articlenum , a.articleid , a.articlename , h.articlehtml as articlecontent , TO_CHAR(a.articledate, 'yyyymmdd') as articledate , a.presscompany , a.url , a.continent , a.sentiment from articles a, article_html h where a.articleid=h.articleid and a.articleid = #{id}
select articlenum , articleid , articlename , articlecontent , TO_CHAR(articledate, 'yyyymmdd') as articledate , presscompany , url , continent , sentiment from articles
select articlenum , articleid , articlename , articlecontent , TO_CHAR(articledate, 'yyyymmdd') as articledate , presscompany , url , continent , sentiment from articles where articleid = #{id}

select articlenum , articleid , articlename , articlecontent , TO_CHAR(articledate, 'yyyymmdd') as articledate , presscompany , url , continent , sentiment from articles where continent = #{continent} and articlecontent like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by articledate desc

select articlenum , articleid , articlename , TO_CHAR(articledate, 'yyyymmdd') as articledate , presscompany from articles where continent = #{continent} and articlecontent like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by articledate desc
